text: The Last Samurai may refer to: * The Last Samurai (2003 film) * The Last Samurai (1974 film) * Mifune: The Last Samurai (2015 documentary) * Oba: The Last Samurai (2011 drama) * The Last Samurai (novel) * "The Last Samurai", the first episode of Knife or Death * Saigō Takamori, dubbed "the last true samurai".
title: The Last Samurai (disambiguation)
